sentences.english: It is profitable to study your mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 研究你的紕繆會給你帶來利潤。

sentences.english: It's wrong to be so rude to your father.
sentences.chinese: 你對於你爸爸云云無禮是紕繆的。

sentences.english: I don't think you re right.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲你是不合紕繆的。

sentences.english: The more mistakes I make, the more progress I.
sentences.chinese: 我犯紕繆越多，前進越大。

sentences.english: Tell me about the last time you learned from someone else's mistake.
sentences.chinese: 請給出一個這段你從別人的紕繆中有所學習的例子。

sentences.english: It was more or less proving them wrong!
sentences.chinese: 而是我要證明他們是紕繆的。

sentences.english: Hou Yaohua should openly admit his mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 侯耀華應該公開認可他的紕繆。

sentences.english: i think you're mistaken about that.
Bpart from a few spelling mistakes, your composition is quite good.
sentences.chinese: 除開幾個拼音書寫紕繆外，你的作文挺正確。

sentences.english: Learn from your mistakes but never repeat them.
sentences.chinese: 要從紕繆中吸取教訓，不要反覆紕繆。

sentences.english: Learn from your mistakes but never repeat them.
sentences.chinese: 要從紕繆中吸取教訓，不要反覆紕繆。
